metadata.title: CVE-2020-26932 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
debian/sympa.postinst for the Debian Sympa package before 6.2.40~dfsg-7uses mode 4755 for sympa_newaliases-wrapper, whereas the intendedpermissions are mode 4750 (for access by the sympa group)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26932` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sympa - 6.2.66~dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sympa package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.66~dfsg-2').
